function.name: run_on_terminal
function.description: Executes a given command on the local terminal and returns the result as a string. If an error occurs during the execution, it returns a string describing the error.

command.description: The command to be executed on the terminal.

function.name: get_user_feedback
function.description: Simulates getting feedback from a user by displaying a question and awaiting the user's input as a response.

question.description: The question that will be asked to the user.

function.name: get_file_content
function.description: Reads and returns the entire content of the specified file as a string. If an error occurs, it returns a string describing the error.

filepath.description: The path to the file from which content is to be read.

function.name: get_directory_tree
function.description: Returns a string representing a tree structure of all the files and directories under the current working directory.

function.name: get_personal_information_about_user
function.description: Provides personal information for a given user name if available. If the user's information is not available, a default message is returned.

user_name.description: The name of the user to retrieve information for.

function.name: end_conversation
function.description: Ends the conversation. Run only when the conversation is finished and the user is satisfied with the result
